text: Kare-ra wa sono naka ni atte sakebudearou. `Omo yo, watashi-tachi o dashite kudasai. Kitto yoi okonai o shimasu. (Kore made) shite ita yona koto wa, itashimasen.'(Kare wa ose rareyou. ) `Ware wa, anata gata o jubun ni chomei sa setade wanai ka. Sonoaida ni daredemo kunkai o ukeireru mono wa, imashime o ukeireta hazu. Shikamo keikoku-sha sae anata gata ni tsukawasa rete ita. Dakara (chobatsu o) ajiwae. Warui okonai no mono ni wa kyujo-sha wa nai nodearu
